title: Interpretation of a shirt in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the shirt in a dream and its meaning in different situations. Seeing clothes in a dream is one of the most common visions that dreamers have. These clothes can look very elegant and beautiful, so the dreamer sees it as a good omen, or they can look bad, so the vision becomes disturbing and the dreamer feels that something bad has happened to him. Others believe that such visions are just dreams that have no meaning for the dreamer, but seeing a shirt is one of those dreams that carry many different interpretations between men and women. Interpretation of a shirt in a dream The shirt in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi indicated that seeing a shirt in a dream is one of the dreamer's praiseworthy dreams, indicating kindness and sustenance. If you see a shirt with Qur’anic verses on it, this vision indicates the extent of commitment to obeying God and memorizing His book. However, if the dreamer sees the shirt and it looks ugly and unclean, this vision is not good for him and shows his bad psychological state as a result of the crisis in reality. Interpretation of a shirt in a dream for a single woman Seeing a shirt in a dream for an unmarried girl has many connotations, as it indicates that she will have the opportunity to travel soon and also shows the stability of the psychological state. If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying a shirt for her father in a dream, this vision indicates a pleasant event that pleases her father, and this event may lie in obtaining a promotion at work or success and distinction, and God knows best. The best. If you wash the shirt in a dream, this vision indicates the coming of comfort and the death of worry and sadness. As for if the unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a man's shirt in a dream, this vision is a symbol of marriage, because it is good news that she will get married soon. Among the indications of seeing the shirt in a dream is that it also symbolizes the achievement of what the dreamer wants in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a shirt for a married woman Seeing a white shirt in a dream for a married woman is a promising vision for her. If she sees a white shirt in a dream, this vision shows the high morals she enjoys, in addition to her pure intention. In the case of a married woman who sees her husband's shirt in a dream, this vision is a sign of kindness and abundance of livelihood, but in the case of washing, it means stability in marital life and mutual love and affection between them. Her husband. As for seeing a new shirt in a dream, this vision indicates changes in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of seeing a shirt in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, it generally indicates goodness and nutrition, especially if she sees a clean shirt. If a pregnant woman sees a green shirt in a dream, this vision means the birth of a girl, but if she sees a black shirt, this dream symbolizes the birth of a boy, and God knows best. We have presented to you the most important things mentioned in the interpretation of the shirt in a dream, and at the end of this article, we must note that all these interpretations mentioned are only the efforts of jurists in interpreting dreams, and this means that we cannot be sure of their achievement in reality because God alone knows the unseen and to interpret

title: Seeing a lot of mother in a dream is good or bad?

preview.html: Sometimes it is repeated in our dreams that we see certain people and not others, and many people wonder whether seeing a mother in a dream is a good or bad thing? In fact, this vision carries many meanings that have been explained to us by interpreters whose interpretation varies from one vision to another, so we will explain the answer to this question in detail through the various interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin through the following lines. Seeing a lot of mother in a dream is good or bad? Seeing a mother in a dream It is a good dream, because the presence of a mother with her children is good, comfort, and happiness. As for seeing a mother in abundance in a dream, according to the interpretations of respected scholars such as the world. Ibn Sirin and others sometimes express the dreamer's feeling of loneliness, especially if the mother has already died. This vision, if the mother is alive, can also express many things such as nourishment, kindness, and blessing, and the dreamer can see his mother in a dream often because of his strong connection to her. In fact, the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The distinguished scholar Ibn Sirin explained to us that seeing a mother in a dream portends promising things, which are as follows: Seeing a mother in a dream repeatedly indicates the dreamer’s need to rest and get rid of the worries and problems that surround his life. Seeing a mother in a dream may be A sign of the dreamer's need to escape reality. If one sees in a dream that his mother is scolding him and speaking to him forcefully and firmly, this means that the dreamer is making many mistakes and making hasty decisions and must reconsider his actions. But if the dreamer sees his mother speaking to him calmly and she is happy and cheerful, this means that Evidence of the sustenance and money that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream for a single woman. There are many indications for seeing the mother of an unmarried woman in a dream, and in general it is considered one of the most promising visions for its owner, as it can indicate the following matters: If a girl sees her mother dead in A dream, but she was in the dream as if she were alive, then this indicates the girl’s need to feel safe. If the girl sees that she is kissing her mother’s hand or head, this is a sign of success in life and the ability to fulfill desires. If a girl dreams that her mother is in good health, This indicates that she is officially linked to a young man who greets her often. A girl who saw her dead mother in her dream and laughed is a sign of her joy for her daughter. Seeing a dead mother in a dream may be a sign of the deceased’s need to give alms to her soul. Interpretation of a mother’s sadness and crying in a dream: Seeing a mother sad or crying indicates Sometimes in a dream it leads to bad things, including: If a person sees his mother in a dream and she is very sad and cries a lot, this is an expression of the dreamer’s bad condition in reality and that he is suffering from major problems. Seeing a dead mother in reality crying in a dream indicates feelings of loneliness and anxiety after her separation. Interpretation of a mother kissing her children in a dream: A righteous mother is one of God’s greatest blessings upon His righteous servants. Seeing a mother receiving her children in a dream indicates many good things, including: If the

title: Interpretation of a dream about my enemy talking to me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my enemy talking to me in a dream In case you want to know the interpretations of scholars regarding the interpretation of a dream about my enemy talking to me in a dream, we will present in the following lines all of this and more details. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy talking to me in a dream Interpretation of dreams about my enemy talking to me in a dream perhaps Talking to someone who is in a dispute with him means getting rid of problems, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If a married man is seen talking to someone who is in a dispute with him, then it is permissible for him to reconcile, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself talking to someone who is in a dispute with him, this may indicate that the problems will stop, and God knows best. The unseen. When a married woman sees, talking to someone she is in disagreement with can mean reconciliation and getting rid of hostility, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my enemy hits me in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see that. However, seeing the enemy Being beaten may be a sign of victory over him, and God knows the unseen. Seeing yourself hitting the enemy may mean that you will get rid of the haters, God willing. If the dreamer sees my enemy hitting me with a whip, it may express unacceptable actions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone conspiring against me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone conspiring against me In a dream, it can indicate loss, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees someone conspiring against him, this may lead to a financial loss, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Someone you must be careful and careful about may express it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married woman sees someone conspiring against her, this may indicate that There are those who are conspiring against her and she must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hateful person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hated person in a dream could be a reference to some hateful people, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a hateful person, this may indicate his relationship with the person in real life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the girl sees An unmarried woman is an evil man, as this may indicate goodness, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a hated individual, this can lead to hatred towards her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of someone hurting me on my hand in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of someone hurting me on my hand in a dream. Seeing a wound on the hand can mean I earn money, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a married man cutting off his hand may mean that you are avoiding sins, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a wound on the right hand indicates a material gain, and God Almighty is high, while seeing a wound on the hand can express problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of someone who hates me and gives me money in Dream Interpretation of a dream about someone who hates me giving me money in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone giving me money but refusing in a dream could be a sign of financial losses, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married man sees someone giving him money but refusing, this may be evidence of reckless decisions, and God knows the unseen. title: What are the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin seeing black shoes in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black shoes in a dream: Shoes or slippers are what a person wears to protect his feet from anything that harms him on the ground, and the shape of the slippers has changed with the progress of time, the difference in tastes, and the multiplicity of shapes, especially in our modern era. Seeing shoes in a dream varies depending on many things, including the dreamer’s condition, the location of the shoe, and its color, and in this article we will take a detailed look at the interpretation of seeing black shoes. Interpretation of a dream of black shoes in a dream The interpretation of seeing black shoes in a dream shows that there are wonderful qualities that distinguish the dreamer and make him Loved by everyone. If the dreamer is a girl, this means that he will communicate with a suitable person in the coming period. This dream is a happy sign and good news for the pioneer because it confirms the dreamer’s increased livelihood and security in whatever path he takes. Interpretation of a dream about black slippers in a dream explains the need to be careful Be careful in the coming period so that the dreamer does not commit any mistakes. It is also a sign of success and abundant sustenance, whether through travel or residence in one country. Since the color of the shoe changes the meaning, if it is white, it indicates the good qualities of the dreamer, and if it is red, this indicates On his great love for others, but if it appears in yellow, it is the color of fatigue and illness. We also find that a shoe that has some dirt on it is a clear indication that the dreamer will face problems in his life. When the dreamer sees him taking off his clothes to wear another, this indicates his marriage to a second wife. Seeing him beautiful in appearance and free of all dirt is evidence of a trouble-free marriage and a good life. Scientists also agreed that this is evidence of marriage to someone with good qualifications, whether the dreamer is male or female. Interpretation of seeing black shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of a dream by Ibn Sirin. With black shoes, it is stated that whoever wears them is evidence of the nearness of the marriage of the man whom she desires so much. If someone sees that he is wearing black shoes and they need polishing, this is a sign that this person is suffering from problems and needs someone to show him steps to solve them. As he interpreted it on It is food and abundance, that is, seeing good news. If it is dirty and has mud stuck to it, it may be a sign of impending problems that are difficult to get rid of quickly. For a married woman, there is good news about pregnancy. Seeing an unmarried woman is evidence of her relationship with a man of good character. Interpretation of a dream Ibn Sirin in black shoesHigh-heeled shoes often belong to women, and seeing them is evidence of traveling and traveling. This vision shows her relationship with a man from the elite of society. The height of the heel on it indicates the high status of the person with whom she is associated. High heels for a man portend his high status and progress in his life Professionalism. If a married woman has never been pregnant before and sees that she is buying black shoes, this indicates that she will become pregnant. The wife who sees shiny black heels and an elegant appearance enjoys her husband’s intense love for her and lives happily and gets along with him. Interpretation of a dream about black shoesInterpretation of a dream about black shoes in a dream for a single womanIbn said Sirin N interpretation of a vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crazy father in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a crazy father in a dream. Interpretation scholars have given many interpretations that express the dream interpretation of seeing a crazy father in a dream, where below we learn about all this and much more..Interpretation of the dream of seeing a crazy father in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: seeing a crazy father in a dream. A dream could be a sign of anxiety about the future, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her father crazy in a dream, this may indicate that problems will be overcome, God willing. If a married woman sees a father who is crazy, this may lead to alleviation of troubles, And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a crazy father in a dream, this may express her freedom from problems and worries, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crazy mother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a crazy mother in a dream could lead to the problems that his mother suffers from, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees A crazy mother in a dream, this may indicate that his mother is going through some crises, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees that her mother is crazy in a dream, this may be a sign that the mother has done something to someone unintentionally, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried young man sees He is married and his mother is crazy in a dream. This may express the problems that her mother is facing, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams is that I saw my sister crazy in a dream. Interpretation of dreams to see my sister crazy in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a crazy woman can lead to the world, and God knows the unseen. When you see madness in a dream, it can be a sign of distress and magic, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees paranoia in a dream, this may represent a wrong interpretation, and God knows best. When you see something burning without harming you, it may be a sign that it is loved and good, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone entering my room in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone entering my room in a dream and I knew him can express his interference in your privacy, and God knows the unseen. It may represent A married woman also dreams of a familiar person entering the room, which may lead to an attempt to interfere in her affairs, and God knows the unseen. Like the vision of a divorced woman, it can For a stranger entering a room to express kindness and living, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream According to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, a funeral is considered one of the most sad situations in which a person finds himself in a life of sadness, exhaustion, and psychological pain. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a funeral in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a funeral in a girl’s dream indicates the suffering of that girl in her life and that the vision indicates that there is Things that always worry and confuse her. Seeing a stranger’s funeral in a girl’s dream indicates the psychological exhaustion that this girl is suffering from. Such a vision may indicate a material loss in the girl’s life or a deterioration in her academic standing. Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a funeral In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream the funeral of someone she knows, and this person is in fact alive and not dead, then this vision indicates the instability of her family life. But if a married woman sees in her dream the funeral of a dead person, such as a dead mother or a dead father, This vision indicates her abandonment of the one she loves. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a coffin in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer seeks in his life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a funeral in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream the funeral of someone she knows in reality, then this vision It indicates that this person will die soon, and only God knows the circumstances and ages. If a pregnant woman dreams in her sleep that she is watching the funeral of a martyr, then this dream indicates that she will give birth to the baby she wants. Attending a funeral in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she will face problems and difficulties that will affect her condition. Psychological.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a funeral in a dream for a young man. Dream interpretation scholars say: If a young man sees in a dream the funeral of another person, then this vision indicates a deterioration in his studies and he may fail in the year in which he saw this vision. Seeing an unknown funeral in a young man’s dream indicates the cancellation of his engagement or separation. About the girl he loves. And if a young man works at a job and sees the funeral in his dream, then this vision indicates that he will leave his job. Interpretation scholars say: If a young man sees in his dream that he is attending the funeral of a martyr, then this is a good vision that promises the dreamer that he will become in a high position and that God God Almighty helps him achieve everything. The ambitions and goals that he pursues. A funeral in a dream is one of the most likely dreams that can be seen during the period when a person suffers from many problems in his life and the day when the person saw himself at a funeral, to get rid of these dreams is always better than to get rid of negative thoughts before sleep.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake swallowing a cat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a snake swallowing a cat in a dream We will present below the interpretation of a dream of a snake swallowing a cat in a dream, and whether it is good or not, all of this and more are the details that interest you, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators..Interpretation of a dream of a snake swallowing a cat in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a snake swallowing a cat In a dream, we did not find specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a snake being killed in a dream could be evidence of achieving difficult goals, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees himself killing a snake in a dream, it may be a sign that he is getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees herself being killed A snake in a dream, as this may represent the defeat of its enemies, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a water snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a water snake in a dream could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a water snake in a dream, it can lead you to overcome problems and worries, God willing. A young man saw a water snake in a dream, as it may represent recovery from illness, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees a large snake emerging from the water, it may lead to the support of an unjust ruler, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a snake after the break of dawn in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake after the break of dawn in a dream. The snake could It is a sign of enemies, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a snake in a dream, this may be evidence of the presence of enemies in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a snake in a dream, she can express her judgments, and God knows everything. Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house in Dream Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees snakes in the house in a dream, this may indicate enemies, and God knows best. When you see snakes in the house without fear, it can lead to a refuge from enemies, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees snakes In the house in a dream, this may be a sign of bad things, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of many snakes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many snakes in a dream could express enemies, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees many snakes in a dream, this may indicate envy, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, If a married woman sees many snakes in a dream, it may represent cunning, and God knows best. When a young man sees many snakes in a dream, this may indicate enemies and an increase in their number, and God is Great and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of many black snakes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many black snakes in a dream may represent enemies who enjoy With strength, and God knows best. Where seeing many black snakes may express powerful enemies, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see black snakes it may express harm, and God knows the unseen. Where it may express the enemy’s attempt to harm the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream. The interpretation of the dream can be the presence A large gray snake in a dream is a sign of a period of distress, and God knows best

title: Interpretation of germs in a dream and bacteria in a dream

preview.html: The concept of bacteria, disease, and bacterial contamination for single, married, pregnant, and divorced girls, and more, according to Ibn Sirin. Bacteria or germs are present everywhere around us, in our bodies, in food, and even in the air we breathe. Their presence in dreams is often linked to the psychological state associated with the environment, for example: The presence of bacteria in a dream indicates that you can turn your weaknesses into strengths. Seeing bacteria in a dream symbolizes your weaknesses that lead you in the wrong direction. Seeing germs in a dream is a sign that warns you to realize your mistakes and try to be at the level to correct your path. As for seeing germs or bacteria through a microscope, it is a sign that there are people in your environment who negatively affect your mood and morale, which requires you to think about this factor. Interpretation of bacteria and germs in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing an accident in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting the incident in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman was single, married, or pregnant. In a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing an accident in a dreamIt indicates unpleasant news that God will hear soon. Seeing a car accident in a dreamIt indicates On the fortune teller’s failure to work because of his competitor at work. Seeing an accident in a dream also indicates that some bad things will happen in the dreamer’s life. Seeing an accident in a dream may indicate many disputes and crises between the dreamer and those close to him. Seeing a car accident on a winding road in a dream indicates a choice The viewer makes a mistake in something, which causes many obstacles and crises in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about preparing a travel bag. What is the interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a single woman? Seeing one person in a car accident in a dream shows her inability to choose the right path in her life. Vision The fiancée is in a car accident in a dream. It says that there are major problems between her and her fiancé that will lead to the breakup of the engagement. Seeing in a dream a single woman who survived a car accident indicates the end of all her worries and problems in her life. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman overturning the car in the accident says that she is a reckless girl who takes All her decisions are hasty. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates her inability to focus on her life and make the right decisions for herself and her children. Seeing a married woman in a dream is a minor accident. She says That there is something in her life that is occupying her mind at the moment. Seeing a married woman escaping from an accident in a dream indicates getting rid of all worries and sorrow in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman in The dream shows that she went through some health problems during the birth process. Seeing a pregnant woman surviving the accident in a dream shows that she will go through a smooth and easy birth process without any fatigue or pain. Seeing a pregnant woman in a car accident in a dream says that she is going through a difficult and tiring pregnancy. What is the interpretation of seeing an accident in A dream for a man? Seeing someone in an accident and dying in a dream indicates that the dreamer has done many bad things in his life. Seeing a man in a car accident in a dream indicates that he is not a good person and is known for his bad reputation in the world. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car repaired in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a young man? Seeing a young man in a dream shows that he will suffer a great loss in his professional or personal life. Seeing a young man in a car accident in a dream indicates that at this time he feels anxiety and anxiety. Seeing

title: Interpretation of hair in a dream: Seeing hair in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of long hair for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether the hair falls on the head, or black or white hair, or leg hair, or throat, or throat. I dreamed of my long hair, my short, curly gray hair, and more than one son. He will show in detail the meanings of hair in your dream. Hair of the head is capital and length. If his hair is long and curly, then he is honored and arrogant, and if he sees the vein long and sparse, then his master’s money is dispersed. And if the hair is soft and smooth, then this is a great increase in money. Whoever dreams of having long hair and is happy with it, then it is praiseworthy. Especially in women; Because they use other people's hair for adornment. Ibn Sirin said: I hate white hair in a dream on a young man because he is poor, and whoever sees that he has removed some of it with light, then if he is rich he lacks money and power, and it is said that his money will go to buy a property, and if he is poor, he will be freed from it. By God, if he removed some and left the rest, some of His blessing would be lost and nothing would be delayed. Whoever sees that there is no good in it, and it is said that it is hateful, detestable, and despicable. Whoever dreams that he is plucking his hair from his chest or back, then if he is confident that he will do that to its owner, and he kisses the pubic hair, it is bad. And whoever sees that his hair is He was frozen and then made. If he was a slave, he would be released. If he was not, then he is not praiseworthy. Whoever sees a young man growing a mustache shows his arrogance and vanity. Whoever dreams of long hair is poverty and debt and may be imprisoned. Whoever sees that he has no hair on his head and is bald indicates an increase in their lives. Whoever sees himself combed is glory. And the state: Whoever dreams that his hair grows in a place where hair does not grow, this indicates the emergence of a debt, and God Almighty decides to pay it. Ibn Sirin dislikes white hair on a young man, and he said that gray hair is a deficiency and he worries if the hair is long. And if a poor man sees it, he will face poverty and debt. And perhaps imprisonment if he saw that plucking his gray hair violated the Sunnah and belittled the status of the sheikhs, and if the young man saw whiteness in his hair, he missed it. On the authority of Al-Hajjaj bin Yusuf, he saw that his head and beard had turned grey, so Abdul Malik bin Marwan felt distress, anguish, and a change in his conditions. If a woman saw his entire head turning color. Grey, then her dream shows her husband’s immorality. If her husband is righteous, then he differs from her with another secret, otherwise he suffers from her grief or grief. As for the black color of a woman’s hair, it indicates two things: one of them is the husband’s love for her, and the second: the integrity of her husband’s circumstances. And if the woman sees that she If she has uncovered her hair, her husband will lose her, and if she sees that she still has her head uncovered, her husband will not return to her, and if she does not have a husband, she will return. He will never marry. If she sees thick hair and the world sees it, she will be exposed to trouble. If a man sees that he has horns on his head, then he is an invincible man. If he sees that the hair on the front of his head is spread, then he will be humiliated. If he sees that the hair on the back of his head has spread, then this indicates a shame that will affect him, and he will grow gray. If He dreams that the hair on the left side of his head is spread, then this indicates that he is influenced by his men and relatives. If the hair on the left side of his head is spread, then he is affected by his relatives, and if it is not related to men and women, the harm returns to himself. Interpretation of the dream about hair as stated in
